name: Book of Stars
description:
Book of Stars

Upcoming work in progress for adding to all Platforms.

Three or more scatters on the screen trigger 10 free game with special expanding symbol. The special expanding symbol can not be substituted by a scatter symbol dungring Free Game
In Free Game mode, 3 or more Treasure chest let you play a Bonus Game

*  Future app will consist of  = Free Credit by watching videos with Unity
